column4: i broke Xubuntu trying to install Compiz`.  now my xfwm4 never loads so i have no window manager.  how can i fix?  i'm looking for suggestions to try when i get a chance later today.  thanks!
: install : compuz fusion icon      with it you can change or restart window manager
compiz fusion icon is a package in synaptic?
: yeah, i downloaded it there, and i am on xubuntu me too
the normal compiz package totally broke Xfce.  :(  i will try your suggestion, thanks!
: maybe it will work, i hope for you,
: did you tried compiz fusion icon?
i am not at the computer, taking notes on what to try when i get home to my Xubuntu.  :)
i have your suggestion noted, thanks.
: do that in terminal : killall compiz.real && xfwm4 –replace        it will restart x
: killall xfwm4 && compiz –replace        to start compiz
will it make xfwm4 auto-start again?  xfwm4 doesn't auto-start at all.
ok, i have noted those commands.  thanks again.  :)
: just try to replace the compiz by xfwm4 or something :)
